20101222030335.000|20101222030337.000|CC1|IT DIDN'T TAKE LONG AT ALL.     
20101222030337.000|20101222030339.000|CC1|WE'RE TALKING ABOUT 24 HOURS.   
20101222030339.000|20101222030342.000|CC1|IN A NEW "WEEKLY STANDARD"      
20101222030342.000|20101222030348.000|CC1|ARTICLE ENTITLED "THE BOY       
20101222030348.000|20101222030349.000|CC1|FROM                            
20101222030349.000|20101222030352.000|CC1|YAZOO CITY," QUOTE, YOU HEARD OF
20101222030352.000|20101222030355.000|CC1|THE CITIZENS COUNSELLES.        
20101222030355.000|20101222030356.000|CC1|UP NORTH THEY THINK IT WAS LIKE 
20101222030356.000|20101222030358.000|CC1|THE KKK.                        
20101222030358.000|20101222030400.000|CC1|WHERE I COM FROM, IT WAS AN     
20101222030400.000|20101222030401.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION OF TOWN LEADERS.   
20101222030401.000|20101222030403.000|CC1|IN Y A.                         
20101222030403.000|20101222030406.000|CC1|ZOO CITY THEY PASSED A          
20101222030406.000|20101222030408.000|CC1|RESOLUTION THAT SAID ANYBODY WHO
20101222030408.000|20101222030412.000|CC1|STARTED A CHAPTER OF THE KLAN   
20101222030412.000|20101222030414.000|CC1|WOULD GET THEIR A -- WE DIDN'T  
20101222030414.000|20101222030417.000|CC1|HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE KLAN IN 
20101222030417.000|20101222030417.000|CC1|YAZOO CITY.                     
20101222030417.000|20101222030419.000|CC1|END QUOTE.                      
20101222030419.000|20101222030421.000|CC1|YES, THE CITIZENS COUNCIL DID   
20101222030421.000|20101222030423.000|CC1|TAKE THOSE STEPS AGAINST THE    
20101222030423.000|20101222030425.000|CC1|LEADING BLACK CITIZENS OF YAZOO 
20101222030425.000|20101222030427.000|CC1|CITY, MISSISSIPPI, WHO HAD      
20101222030427.000|20101222030430.000|CC1|SIGNED AN NAACP PETITION CALLING
20101222030430.000|20101222030432.000|CC1|FOR INTEGRATION.                
20101222030432.000|20101222030434.000|CC1|BARBOUR ALSO SAYS IN THE ARTICLE
20101222030434.000|20101222030437.000|CC1|THAT HE WENT TO SEE MARTIN      
20101222030437.000|20101222030439.000|CC1|LUTHER KING JR. SPEAK, BUT HE   
20101222030439.000|20101222030442.000|CC1|DIDN'T HEAR WHAT REVEREND KING  
20101222030442.000|20101222030444.000|CC1|WAS SAYING, BECAUSE BARBOUR WAS 
20101222030444.000|20101222030446.000|CC1|DISTRACTED BY GIRLS.            
20101222030446.000|20101222030448.000|CC1|HIS OVERALL TAKE ON SEGREGATION 
20101222030448.000|20101222030451.000|CC1|IN YAZOO CITY IN MISSISSIPPI,   
20101222030451.000|20101222030453.000|CC1|QUOTE -- I JUST DON'T REMEMBER  
20101222030453.000|20101222030456.000|CC1|IT AS BEING THAT BAD.           
20101222030456.000|20101222030459.000|CC1|JOINING ME NOW ARE THE REVEREND 
20101222030459.000|20101222030500.000|CC1|JESSE JACKSON, FOUNDER AND      
20101222030500.000|20101222030503.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE RAINBOW PUSH   
20101222030503.000|20101222030506.000|CC1|COALITION, AND MATT COOPER,     
20101222030506.000|20101222030508.000|CC1|WHITE HOUSE MANAGING EDITOR FOR 
20101222030508.000|20101222030510.000|CC1|"THE NATIONAL JOURNAL."         
20101222030510.000|20101222030513.000|CC1|HERE'S HALEY BARBOUR'S STATEMENT
20101222030513.000|20101222030515.000|CC1|TODAY -- WHEN ASKED ABOUT WHY MY
20101222030515.000|20101222030518.000|CC1|HOMETOWN IN MISSISSIPPI DID NOT 
20101222030518.000|20101222030520.000|CC1|SUFFER THE SAME RACIAL VIOLENCE 
20101222030520.000|20101222030523.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS A YOUNG MAN THAT     
20101222030523.000|20101222030526.000|CC1|ACCOMPANIED OTHER TOWNS'        
20101222030526.000|20101222030528.000|CC1|INTEGRATION EFFORTS, MY POINT   
20101222030528.000|20101222030532.000|CC1|WAS MY TOWN REJECTED THE KU KLUX
20101222030532.000|20101222030534.000|CC1|KLAN, BUT NOBODY SHOULD CONSTRUE
20101222030534.000|20101222030537.000|CC1|THAT TO MEAN I THINK THE TOWN   
20101222030537.000|20101222030540.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP WERE SARNTS, EITHER. 
20101222030540.000|20101222030542.000|CC1|THEIR VEHICLE CALLED THE        
20101222030542.000|20101222030545.000|CC1|CITIZENS COUNCIL, IS TOTALLY    
20101222030545.000|20101222030547.000|CC1|INDEFENSIBLE, AS IS SEGREGATION.
20101222030547.000|20101222030549.000|CC1|IT WAS A DIFFICULT AND PAINFUL  
20101222030549.000|20101222030550.000|CC1|ERA FOR MISSISSIPPI, THE REST OF
20101222030550.000|20101222030554.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY, AND ESPECIALLY     
20101222030554.000|20101222030554.000|CC1|AFRICAN-AMERICANS WHO WERE      
20101222030554.000|20101222030556.000|CC1|PERSECUTED IN THAT TIME.        
20101222030556.000|20101222030600.000|CC1|SO REVEREND JACKSON, IN HIS NEW 
20101222030600.000|20101222030602.000|CC1|STATEMENT, NOT THAT BAD BECOMES 
20101222030602.000|20101222030604.000|CC1|DIFFICULT AND PAINFUL.          
20101222030604.000|20101222030605.000|CC1|AND THE CITIZENS COUNCIL GOES   
20101222030605.000|20101222030608.000|CC1|FROM BEING PRAISED TO SUDDENLY  
20101222030608.000|20101222030610.000|CC1|BEING TOTALLY INDEFENSIBLE.     
20101222030610.000|20101222030612.000|CC1|NOW, YOU WERE THERE, YOU WERE IN
20101222030612.000|20101222030613.000|CC1|MISSISSIPPI IN THOSE YEARS.     
20101222030613.000|20101222030615.000|CC1|WHICH VIEW OF HIS STORY IS      
20101222030615.000|20101222030618.000|CC1|RIGHT?                          
20101222030618.000|20101222030620.000|CC1|>> WELL, ACTUALLY IT WAS CALLED 
20101222030620.000|20101222030622.000|CC1|THE WHITE CITIZENS COUNCIL.     
20101222030622.000|20101222030624.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT IT WAS REALLY       
20101222030624.000|20101222030625.000|CC1|CALLED.                         
20101222030625.000|20101222030629.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED WHEN YOU  
20101222030629.000|20101222030631.000|CC1|TRIVIALIZE RACHELLE -- AND YOU  
20101222030631.000|20101222030635.000|CC1|HAVE SELECTIVE MEMORY.          
20101222030635.000|20101222030636.000|CC1|IT WAS NOT -- THEY NEVER ASKED  
20101222030636.000|20101222030641.000|CC1|DR. KING OR RABBI HASHEL TO COME
20101222030641.000|20101222030643.000|CC1|SPEAK AT ONE OF THEIR RALLIES,  
20101222030643.000|20101222030645.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE.                    
20101222030645.000|20101222030647.000|CC1|THEY BELIEVED IN SEGREGATION,   
20101222030647.000|20101222030649.000|CC1|SEDITION AND STATES' RIGHTS.    
20101222030649.000|20101222030651.000|CC1|THEY WERE A VIOLENT GROUP.      
20101222030651.000|20101222030655.000|CC1|WE KNEW THEM BY WHITE SHEETS BY 
20101222030655.000|20101222030657.000|CC1|NIGHT AND BLACK ROBES AND BLUE  
20101222030657.000|20101222030658.000|CC1|SUITS BY DAY.                   
20101222030658.000|20101222030700.000|CC1|IT WAS A PAINFUL ERA, AND WAS   
20101222030700.000|20101222030702.000|CC1|AGAIN THE GREAT AMERICAN DREAM  
20101222030702.000|20101222030704.000|CC1|WE ARE NOW ARE CLOSER TO.       
20101222030704.000|20101222030708.000|CC1|>> MATT COOPER, WE DISMANTLED   
20101222030708.000|20101222030709.000|CC1|THIS STATEMENT, SHOWING AS IT   
20101222030709.000|20101222030712.000|CC1|WAS THE WHITE CITIZENS COUNCIL. 
20101222030712.000|20101222030713.000|CC1|THEY CHANGED THEIR NAME AS THEY 
20101222030713.000|20101222030715.000|CC1|MOVED INTO THE '60s, BUT THEY   
20101222030715.000|20101222030718.000|CC1|DIDN'T CHANGE THEIR OBJECTIVES. 
20101222030718.000|20101222030719.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU SEE IN A POTENTIAL  
20101222030719.000|20101222030722.000|CC1|CANDIDATE FOR THE REPUBLICAN    
20101222030722.000|20101222030725.000|CC1|NOMINATION GOING INTO THIS      
20101222030725.000|20101222030725.000|CC1|TERRITORY.                      
20101222030725.000|20101222030728.000|CC1|IS THIS -- WAS THIS DELIBERATE? 
20101222030728.000|20101222030729.000|CC1|WAS THIS A GAFF?                
20101222030729.000|20101222030731.000|CC1|HIS WAY OF TRYING TO WIN THE    
20101222030731.000|20101222030733.000|CC1|SOUTH CAROLINA PRIMARY?         
20101222030733.000|20101222030733.000|CC1|WHAT IS THIS?                   
20101222030733.000|20101222030736.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU KNOW, IT'S HARD TO 
20101222030736.000|20101222030737.000|CC1|LOOK INTO HIS MIND, LAWRENCE,   
20101222030737.000|20101222030739.000|CC1|BUT I THINK ANY SOUTHERN        
20101222030739.000|20101222030741.000|CC1|POLITICIAN IN THE LAST 30, 40   
20101222030741.000|20101222030744.000|CC1|YEARS WHO'S HAD NATIONAL        
20101222030744.000|20101222030746.000|CC1|AMBITIONS HAS RECOGNIZED THEY   
20101222030746.000|20101222030747.000|CC1|HAVE TO SAY SOMETHING PROFOUND  
20101222030747.000|20101222030749.000|CC1|AND SERIOUS ABOUT CIVIL RIGHTS, 
20101222030749.000|20101222030751.000|CC1|WHETHER IT WAS JIMMY CARTER ON  
20101222030751.000|20101222030754.000|CC1|OR MIKE HUCKABEE IN ARKANSAS OR 
20101222030754.000|20101222030757.000|CC1|BILL CLINTON OR AL GORE, YOU HAD
20101222030757.000|20101222030800.000|CC1|TO ACKNOWLEDGE THE REGION'S     
20101222030800.000|20101222030802.000|CC1|PAINFUL HISTORY WITH SERIOUSNESS
20101222030802.000|20101222030803.000|CC1|AND MOVE ON FROM THERE.         
20101222030803.000|20101222030805.000|CC1|HE CLEARLY HAS NOT BEEN IN THE  
20101222030805.000|20101222030806.000|CC1|NEW SOUTH TRADITION.            
20101222030806.000|20101222030810.000|CC1|TO SORT OF LIKEN THE CITIZENS   
20101222030810.000|20101222030812.000|CC1|COUNSEL ALSO TO FORWARD-THINKING
20101222030812.000|20101222030815.000|CC1|BUSINESS LEADERS TO EASE THEIR  
20101222030815.000|20101222030819.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES INTO DESEGREGATION  
20101222030819.000|20101222030821.000|CC1|IS ABSURD.                      
20101222030821.000|20101222030824.000|CC1|CITIZENS COUNCILS WERE FORMED TO
20101222030824.000|20101222030825.000|CC1|FIGHT INTEGRATION.              
20101222030825.000|20101222030826.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY THEY WERE FORMED IN  
20101222030826.000|20101222030830.000|CC1|THE MID '50s.                   
20101222030830.000|20101222030832.000|CC1|>> GO AHEAD, REVEREND.          
20101222030832.000|20101222030834.000|CC1|>> LAWRENCE, THE LARGEST SINGLE 
20101222030834.000|20101222030838.000|CC1|INDUSTRY IN YAZOO CITY IS A
